10.query:
timeseries responseTime=avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd responseTime = arrayAvg(responseTime)
| sort responseTime desc
| limit 20
10.title: Top 10 slowest services

11.query:
timeseries failureCount=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd failureCount = arraySum(failureCount)
| sort failureCount desc
| limit 20
11.title: Most failing services

12.title: All HTTP 4xx and 5xx on the environment

14.query:
timeseries requestCount=sum(dt.service.request.count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd requestCountAgg = arraySum(requestCount)
| filterOut dt.entity.service.name == "Requests to unmonitored hosts"
| sort requestCountAgg desc
| limit 20
14.title: Service throughput

15.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.provider == "KUBERNETES_EVENT" AND isNotNull(dt.entity.cloud_application.name)
| summarize erc=count(), by: { dt.entity.cloud_application.name }
| sort erc desc
15.title: Most common K8s events

2.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| join [ 
  fetch events
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_events"
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
  | filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.host")
  | filterOut event.status == "CLOSED"
  | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], on:{ left[id] == right[affected_entity_ids] }, executionOrder:leftFirst, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd problemState=if(isNull(right.timestamp), "HEALTHY", else: "UNHEALTHY")
2.title: Host health

23.title: Memory Allocation Objects and Bytes by API

leftYAxisSettings.label: Process memory allocation bytes ‚Ä¢ Process memory allocation objects count

24.title: Memory Allocation Objects by API

25.title: GC by Poolname and GCname

26.title: JVM CPU by ThreadGroup

28.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }
| sort arrayAvg(usage) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsRemove dt.entity.host
| limit 50
28.title: CPU Usage %

3.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| join [ 
  fetch events
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_events"
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
  | filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.service")
  | filterOut event.status == "CLOSED"
  | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], on:{ left[id] == right[affected_entity_ids] }, executionOrder:leftFirst, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd problemState=if(isNull(right.timestamp), "HEALTHY", else: "UNHEALTHY")
3.title: Service health

31.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd usage = arrayAvg(usage)
| sort usage desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsRemove dt.entity.host
| limit 20
31.title: Top 20 - CPU Usage %

32.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.memory.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }
| sort arrayAvg(usage) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsRemove dt.entity.host
| limit 50
32.title: Memory Usage %

33.query:
timeseries usage = avg(dt.host.memory.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd usage = arrayAvg(usage)
| sort usage desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.host)
| fieldsRemove dt.entity.host
| limit 20
33.title: Top 20 - Memory Usage %

35.title: Service request count

36.content:
Transactions analysed, and grouped per services with presets:
* [üê¢ >10 Sec](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=duration+>%3D+10s) 
* [üêå > 30 Sec](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=duration+>%3D+30s)
* [>100 ms CPU time](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=span.timing.cpu+>%3D+100ms)
* [That contain a custom HTTP header `x-dynatrace-test`](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=http.request.header.x-dynatrace-test+%3D+*&tf=now-1h%3Bnow)
* [Has URL path '/api/cart'](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=url.path+%3D+"%2Fapi%2Fcart")
* [Success only](/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Ctrue&sidebar=a%2Ctrue&tableMode=grouping&groupedByColumns=dt.entity.service.entity.name&filter=request.status_code+%3D+Success)
* [‚ö°Ô∏è Exceptions](https://)


Direct links to:
* [Profiling and Optimization](/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.profiling/ui/profiling-optimization)

* [SmartScape](/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.smartscape/#smartscape)
* [Technologies](/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.technologies/#newprocessessummary;gtf=-2h;gf=all)

4.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| join [ 
  fetch events
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_events"
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
  | filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.cloud_application")
  | filterOut event.status == "CLOSED"
  | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], on:{ left[id] == right[affected_entity_ids] }, executionOrder:leftFirst, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd problemState=if(isNull(right.timestamp), "HEALTHY", else: "UNHEALTHY")
| dedup id
4.title: K8s Services health

5.query:
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| join [ 
  fetch events
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_events"
  | filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM"
  | filter in(affected_entity_types, "dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster")
  | filterOut event.status == "CLOSED"
  | filter isNull(dt.davis.is_duplicate) OR not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], on:{ left[id] == right[affected_entity_ids] }, executionOrder:leftFirst, kind:leftOuter
| fieldsAdd problemState=if(isNull(right.timestamp), "HEALTHY", else: "UNHEALTHY")
5.title: K8s Cluster health

8.query:
timeseries {
  p95=percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 90),
  reqCount=sum(dt.service.request.count)
  }, by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| filterOut dt.entity.service.name == "Requests to unmonitored hosts"
| fieldsAdd value.A = arrayAvg(p95), value.B = arrayAvg(reqCount)
| fieldsAdd requestTimeToRequestCount = value.A*value.B
| sort requestTimeToRequestCount DESC
| limit 15
| fieldsRemove value.A, value.B, requestTimeToRequestCount, reqCount
8.title: Service 90th Percentile
